lyrics.lyrictitle: Nemureru Mori no Oujisama ~haru, natsu, aki, fuyu~

lyric.verse: Guuzen mimi ni shita Hidamari no naka de iki wo shiteiru you datta Natsukashii namae Hibiita mune no oku. Azayaka ni zenbu kata ni nokoru nioi made mo Mada oboeteita.
lyric.chorus: Haru to natsu to aki to fuyu wo sugoshita Nazeka itsumo furimukinagara. Haru to natsu to aki to fuyu wo koushite Kurai mori wo samayoinagara. Watashi wa ito o tsumuideiru Watashi wa hitori chi wo nagashiteiru.
lyric.verse: Kyou mo yume wo mita. Ookina mado e to Watashi wa sotto aruiteta. Ano hosoi michi wo. Yakitsuku sono negao Yomigaeru no wa nemureru mori no ojisama Mou mezamenaide.
lyric.chorus: Haru to natsu to aki to fuyu wo futari de Hoka no dare mo aisanu you ni Haru to natsu to aki to fuyu wo koushite Hoka no dare mo mienai you ni Watashi wa anata o sagashiteiru Watashi wa anata o aishiteiru.
lyric.verse: Anata to watashi wa Hanarete wa ikenakatta no. Suteki ne. Sou na no yo. Saa tsumu wo togimashou.
lyric.chorus: Haru to natsu to aki to fuyu wo sugoshita Nazeka itsumo furimukinagara. Haru to natsu to aki to fuyu wo koushite Kurai mori wo samayoinagara. Haru to natsu to aki to fuyu wo futari de Hoka no dare mo aisanu you ni Haru to natsu to aki to fuyu wo koushite Hoka no dare mo mienai you ni Watashi wa shiro e mukatteiru. Watashi to mori ni nemurimashou.

lyric.verse: It was coincidence when I heard it Like breathing in a sunny spot That sweet name Reverberating inside my heart Even your scent that remained on my shoulder I clearly remembered everything.
lyric.chorus: I spent spring, summer, fall and winter and I have always been looking back. I spent spring, summer, fall and winter wandering around the dark forest I am spinning yarn I am bleeding alone
lyric.verse: I dream that dream again I was walking slowly to a big window Through that narrow way Imprinted sleeping face on my mind Waking the sleeping prince in the forest Oh, please don't wake up
lyric.chorus: I spent spring, summer, fall and winter with you Not to love anybody else anymore I spent spring, summer, fall and winter Not to see anybody else anymore I am searching for you I love you
lyric.verse: You and I shouldn't have departed Yes, it is wonderful So let us sharpen a spindle
lyric.chorus: I spent spring, summer, fall and winter and I have always been looking back. I spent spring, summer, fall and winter wandering around the dark forest I spent spring, summer, fall and winter with you Not to love anybody else anymore I spent spring, summer, fall and winter Not to see anybody else anymore I am going to that castle Let us sleep in the forest
